lines.text: You've been found guilty of the charges brought against you. Do you have anything to say before I pronounce sentence.
Would it do me any good if I did?
It might.
I don't think so. I ain't got nothin' to say.
Suck it, you jailhouse fairy!

[as Bottom Bunk Prisoner starts crying in pain]
Oh, yeah. Yeah, lemme fuck your ass, you faggot! Yeah! Fuck you with my big cock! Whoa, yeah! Fuck your ass, you jailhouse faggot! Oh, yeah! Ooo! Fuck your ass, fuckin' queer! Oh, yeah, fuck your ass, you bitch!

[finding himself groped]
You like that, huh? Well, that'll cost you a carton of cigarettes.
From what I hear - the story's out - it's a big one.
Two cartons and it's yours.
Yeah, you like that, don't ya. See, it IS the biggest around. You heard right.
Take it like a man, yeah.
Tighten it! Yeah, tighten that! Oh-ho-ho, yeah! Tighten it!
Oh, talk to me. TELL me you like it!
You guys lookin' for somethin'?
Yeah, a hot piece of ass. You have any ideas?
I need to get off real bad.
Well, why don't one of you guys go see if there's any bulls coming?
How's it goin', pretty boy.
Fuck off, screw.
Still coppin' an attitude, huh?
I could make your life here much easier. I could even help you get out sooner... if you're nice.
[frequently repeated]
Tighten that ass!
I really had a good time this afternoon. I'm really glad we met.
Same here. It's been fun.
Who's that guy in those pictures? Is he a brother or something?
No, just a really close friend.
I get it. Where is he at now?
He got thirty days on a bum wrap. That's a long story.
I have a feeling when he gets back I'm not gonna see much of you.
[a pause between them]

[smirking]
Let's do it again.
